channel.title: Softlayer_billing_currency_country on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_currency_country on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country service provides information about what currencies a customer in a specific country is eligible to use. Methods getCountriesWithListOfEligibleCurrencies Get map between countries and what currencies can be supported for customers in that country. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country data type maps what currencies are valid for specific countries. US Dollars are valid from any country, but other currencies are only available to customers in certain countries. Local countryId A unique identifier for the related country. Type: integer currencyId A unique identifier for the related currency. Type: integer id A unique identifier for a map between a country and currency.
